title: May I get a refund?
body: I know its really unlikely but I bought {{champion:54}} a little over a week ago at this point, to me he isn't fun to play at all and just needs a rework (mega imo) but may I get my ip back? thanks.

replies.body: dont refund him i did the same mistake with ryze when i started to play dont use ur refunds on champs not worth it
I don't have any refunds, thats the problem

It should be possible to refund Malphite if you've got a token left and purchased within 90 days, per the[ refund guidelines](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).  If you're out, you could hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can review your specific case.  Can't make any guarantees, but worth a try!
